ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as auditor of Canada CH Investment Corporation, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2011; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of Canada CH Investment Corporation, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2011.
